subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: England’s Richard Bland and Sweden’s Fredrik Andersson Hed shot 66s in the third round to join a seven-way tie at 11-under-par 205 atop the leader board at the Avantha Masters in Gurgaon, India.
snippet: England’s Richard Bland and Sweden’s Fredrik Andersson Hed shot 66s in the third round to join a seven-way tie at 11-under-par 205 atop the leader board at the Avantha Masters in Gurgaon, India.
